channel.title: Hollywood Zoo Crew
channel.itunes:title: Hollywood Zoo Crew
channel.itunes:author: Hollywood Zoo Crew
channel.description: A comedy improv podcast, here to provide all the 100% true latest news, haps, interviews, and reviews of what goes on in Hollywood, outside of it.

item.title: Banana Grammar
item.itunes:title: Banana Grammar
item.description:
Audacity ate a track from our first recording session, so this is the first episode of Hollywood Outsider we can actually release! On this week's episode we discuss the upcoming oscars, subs or dubs?, our favorite scene from the film Banana Grammar, and second puberty.
This weeks episode sponsored by Freddy's Flying Fingers and Sploosh Buddies.
